Articles.Content:
Hey Everyone,

I have been playing KSP for a week or so and I know a bit but I can't seem to be able to build rockets that stay in the air long enough to get into orbit. I was also looking for a few tips on how to build space-planes and docking ships while in orbit. Thanks in advance!

Welcome aboard!

Do you have a picture of your craft, or better yet, the craft file so the community can offer some suggestions? Unfortunately, I can't help with docking, I've never managed it yet ._.
I suggest you use the Kerbal X (Stock). It can even reach the Mun (don't quote me on that)! Make sure to tilt your rocket at around 10 km to get into actual orbit.
